Title: Shadow upon Shadow
Description:
<Faerin's wide eyes dart around in surprise.>

What just happened? Did you see that shadow? And the oil well... it's gone dark? 

I've never seen anything like this before. 

Could it be the nearby dawntower? Hurry!
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet with Alleria at the Cliffside Beacon.
RewardText: The fear and shame of these people lingers in the air like a fog.

Objectives.Text: Find Faerin at the Tower Overlook
